title: The Perfect Beauty Sitting Next to Me at the School I Transferred To Is My Ex-GF - Novel Updates
genre: Harem   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Yandere
author: 神月夜月
description:
I transferred to a new school because of family reasons and was excited about my new school life.

But when I went to school, I found out that the seat next to me was occupied by my ex-girlfriend.

It would be fine if she was just an ex-girlfriend, but she is too jealous!

「Hey, why did you ignore me?」

「No, we broke up, right?」

「We didn't break up, though?」

「Huh!?」

A youthful romantic comedy with a jealous ex-girlfriend!>
